products.description: Enterprise cloud platform for running applications, data and AI workloads with predictable performance and security. Helps IT and engineering teams migrate, scale, and optimize costs for production and analytics. Built for high-performance and enterprise scale.

Self-managing database that automates tuning, patching, and security to reduce admin burden. Helps DBAs and application teams cut operational cost and downtime while accelerating app delivery. Provides enterprise reliability and built-in data protection at scale.

Industry-standard database for storing and managing enterprise data across apps and analytics. Helps IT and data teams ensure reliability, security and consistent performance for critical systems. Supports large-scale deployments and multicloud use cases.

Unified data platform to prepare, secure and serve data for enterprise AI and analytics. Helps data teams consolidate sources, accelerate model training, and govern data for trusted AI outcomes. Speeds AI adoption with enterprise-grade controls and scalability.

Cloud financial management suite for streamlining accounting, procurement and core finance processes. Helps finance teams increase visibility, automate close and control costs across the business. Scales from subsidiaries to global enterprises with standard best practices.

Human capital management suite for recruiting, payroll, talent and workforce planning. Helps HR leaders modernize employee experience, reduce administrative work and make data-driven people decisions. Supports global payroll and compliance needs.

Supply chain management suite to plan, procure and move goods with agility and visibility. Helps operations and logistics teams reduce inventory risk, speed fulfillment and respond to disruption. Designed for collaboration across suppliers and channels.

Customer experience suite that unifies sales, service and marketing to improve customer journeys. Helps revenue and support teams deliver personalized interactions, close deals faster and resolve issues more efficiently. Integrates customer data for consistent experiences.

Cloud ERP for growing and mid-market companies to manage finance, CRM and commerce in one system. Helps business leaders consolidate operations, improve forecasting and scale without heavy IT overhead. Provides fast deployment and out-of-the-box business processes.

Engineered system for running Oracle databases with high performance and reliability. Helps IT teams boost transaction and analytics speed while simplifying database operations. Ideal for large-scale database consolidation and demanding workloads.

Low-code application development platform for building business apps quickly with minimal coding. Helps citizen developers and IT teams deliver forms, reports and workflows fast while keeping data secure. Accelerates modernization of legacy processes with low maintenance.

Mature application platform and runtime for building and running enterprise applications. Helps developers deliver portable, scalable software with a large ecosystem and enterprise support. Supports modernization and long-term application stability.

Business intelligence platform that turns data into interactive dashboards and insights. Helps analysts and business leaders explore trends, monitor KPIs and make faster decisions without heavy IT support. Scales from team reporting to enterprise analytics programs.

Packaged AI capabilities for embedding language, vision and prediction into applications. Helps product teams and business units add automation and insight to workflows without building models from scratch. Provides secure, enterprise-ready AI building blocks.

Tooling to design and customize AI agents that automate business tasks and workflows. Helps process owners and developers create governed agents for finance, HR, supply chain and support. Speeds deployment of repeatable AI assistants with enterprise controls.

Marketplace for discovering, buying and deploying prebuilt AI agents for industry and process use cases. Helps business teams find tested agents for common tasks and accelerate time-to-value. Enables partners to package solutions and customers to deploy quickly and securely.

Managed cloud offering that brings Oracle cloud services into customer data centers for data residency and compliance. Helps regulated organizations keep workloads on-premises while using Oracle cloud controls and updates. Balances cloud benefits with on-site governance.

Fully managed, on-premises Oracle cloud region for large enterprises needing isolated cloud capacity. Helps large organizations run cloud-native apps and AI at their site with enterprise SLAs and compliance. Ideal for strict residency, latency and control requirements.

Suite of tools and frameworks to build, test and deploy enterprise applications faster. Helps development teams improve productivity with integrated tooling, CI/CD and cloud deployment options. Supports modern and legacy application modernization efforts.

Online catalog where customers discover and purchase Oracle-validated applications, services and agents. Helps buyers accelerate deployments by choosing tested solutions from Oracle and partners. Simplifies procurement and integrates with Oracle cloud subscriptions.

Prebuilt industry-specific application suites tailored for sectors like healthcare, banking and hospitality. Helps industry leaders speed transformation with workflows and data models aligned to regulatory and operational needs. Reduces customization and accelerates time-to-value.
